body.gathalast: Parisaṃ mañca toseti, yathā kaccāyano ayaṃ.
body.gatha1: evaṃvidhaṃ kañci (sī. pī.), aññaṃ passāmi sāvakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tadā mamāsayaṃ ñatvā, byākāsi sa raṇañjaho.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kaccānassa guṇaṃ sutvā, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayaṃ ṭhito;
body.gathalast: Kaccāno nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako.
Pāpuṇissati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yathāyaṃ byākato mayā.
Aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
Nīce kule na jāyāmi, buddhapūjāyidaṃ phalaṃ.
Mātā ca candimā nāma, kaccānohaṃ varattaco.
Pāpuṇiṃ amataṃ santaṃ, sesehi saha sattahi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
body.gathalast: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike; Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākaccāyano thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Rañjayaṃ parisaṃ sabbaṃ, santhavī sāvakaṃ sakaṃ.
Natthi etādiso añño, yathāyaṃ bhikkhu vakkali.
Hutvā sutvā ca taṃ vākyaṃ, taṃ ṭhānamabhirocayiṃ.
body.gatha1: idha saddhādhimutto isi (syā.), ito sattamakehani (sī. pī.);
body.gathalast: Bhikkhu saddhāvataṃ aggo, tādiso homahaṃ mune’.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Vakkali nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
Sāvatthiyaṃ pure jāto, kule aññatare ahaṃ.
Imaṃ dadāma te nātha, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyaka.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tadā paṭiggahi so maṃ, bhītānaṃ saraṇo muni;
‘‘‘Yo hi passati saddhammaṃ, so maṃ passati paṇḍito;
body.gathalast: Apassamāno saddhammaṃ, maṃ passampi na passati.
Vakkalīti jino vācaṃ, taṃ sutvā mudito ahaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā vakkalitthero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Kappino nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
Tato cutā mayaṃ sabbe, ahumha tidasūpagā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Suyuttā tassa sissā ca, sumuttā ca anāsavā’;
‘‘Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ;
‘‘Satasahasse kataṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ dassesi me idha;
‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
Kassapo nāma gottena, uppajji vadataṃ varo.
Na suṇissāma saddhammaṃ, aho no appapuññatā.
Sāgaro ca sasokova, vinadī karuṇaṃ giraṃ.
Saṃviggā bhikkhavo satta, cintayimha mayaṃ tadā.
Ahañca pakkusāti ca, sabhiyo bāhiyo tathā.
Mātā matā citāruḷhā, tato nippatito ahaṃ.
Jino tasmiṃ guṇe tuṭṭho, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā dabbamallaputto thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Sākhena cattā me mātā, nigrodhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhamhi jīvitaṃ’.
Āgamma rammaṃ tusitādhivāsaṃ, gatā pavāsaṃ sagharaṃ yatheva.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Abhivādiya sambuddhaṃ, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayiṃ tadā.
Bāhiyo nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
Kāraṃ katvā cuto saggaṃ, agaṃ sabhavanaṃ yathā.
Tato cutā pañca janā, devalokaṃ agamhase.
Bhesajjena ca sakkatvā, hessāma sukhitā mayaṃ.
‘Na tvaṃ upāyamaggaññū, kuto tvaṃ arahā bhave’.
‘Ke vā ete kuhiṃ loke, arahanto naruttamā.
So sakyaputto arahā anāsavo, deseti dhammaṃ arahattapattiyā.
Upecca rammaṃ vijitavhayaṃ vanaṃ, dije apucchiṃ kuhiṃ lokanandano.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Tato avocuṃ naradevavandito, puraṃ paviṭṭho asanesanāya so;
body.gathalast: paccehi (sī. syā.)khippaṃ munidassanussuko, upecca vandāhi tamaggapuggalaṃ’.
body.gatha1: bhājayantaṃ viyāmataṃ (sī.), jotayantaṃ idhāmataṃ (syā.), bhājayantaṃ idaṃmataṃ (pī.);
body.gathalast: Yo me dhammamadesesi, gambhīraṃ suññataṃ padaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.gathalast: Ekaṃ gāthāpadaṃ seyyo, yaṃ sutvā upasammati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
body.gathalast: Na tattha sukkā jotanti, ādicco na pakāsati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Na tattha candimā bhāti, tamo tattha na vijjati;
body.gathalast: Yadā ca attanā vedi, munimonena brāhmaṇo.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā bāhiyo thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
Atthe dhamme nirutte ca, paṭibhāne ca kovidaṃ.
Nipacca pādamūlamhi, taṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayiṃ ahaṃ.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Koṭṭhiko nāma nāmena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
Aññaṃ gatiṃ na gacchāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Nīce kule na jāyāmi, suciṇṇassa idaṃ phalaṃ.
Yadā me pitaraṃ buddho, vinayī sabbasuddhiyā.
Pabhinnā tena lokaggo, etadagge ṭhapesi maṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
Parisā mahatī hotu, nibbattassa tahiṃ tahiṃ’.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
Kassapo nāma gottena, hessati satthu sāvako’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So ca sabbaṃ tamaṃ hantvā, vijaṭetvā mahājaṭaṃ;
body.gathalast: Khemaṃ vijiritaṃ katvā, puna dethāti bhāsatha’.
Nibbute tamhi lokagge, pūjaṃ katvā yathābalaṃ.
Bahudhā saṃsito santo, diṭṭhiṃ hitvāna pāpikaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tadā dve bhātaro mayhaṃ, pabbajiṃsu mayā saha;
body.gathalast: Tato me āsi paññatti, uruveḷakassapo iti.
Mama pañca satānūnā, sissā sabbe mamānugā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te cevaññe ca bahavo, sissā maṃ parivārayuṃ;
body.gathalast: Aho buddhe kataṃ kāraṃ, saphalaṃ me ajāyatha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā uruveḷakassapo thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
Nipacca sirasā pāde, taṃ ṭhānaṃ abhipatthayiṃ.
Sasaṅghe me kataṃ kāraṃ, atīva vipulaṃ tayā.
Gotamo nāma gottena, satthā loke bhavissati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, yāvajīvaṃ tadā jinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sabbattha sukhito āsiṃ, tassa kammassa vāhasā.
Yadā jiṇṇo ca vuddho ca, tadārāmamupāgamiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Pabbajjaṃ na labhe vīra, svākkhāte tava sāsane;
body.gathalast: Tena sokena dīnosmi, saraṇaṃ hohi nāyaka’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā rādho thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
Parakammāyane yutto, natthi me kiñci saṃdhanaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ sutvā mudito hutvā, nipacca sirasā jinaṃ;
body.gathalast: Moghaṃ rajjaṃ sukhaṃ yasmā, mogharājā tato ahaṃ.
Apucchiṃ nipuṇaṃ pañhaṃ, taṃ vīraṃ vādisūdanaṃ.
Kathaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passati’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Svāgataṃ vata me āsi…pe… kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
body.centered: Itthaṃ sudaṃ āyasmā mogharājā thero imā gāthāyo
body.gathalast: Dabbo kumāranāmo ca, bāhiyo koṭṭhiko vasī.
